data_description.id_or_passport: The government ID or passport number provided when registering with Ituran.
data_description.phone_number: The mobile phone number provided when registering with Ituran. A one-time password will be sent to this mobile number.

data_description.otp: A one-time-password sent as a text message to the mobile phone number provided before.

reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: A new one-time password will be sent to {phone_number}.

api_error.message: An error occurred while communicating with the Ituran service.

auth_error.message: Failed authenticating with the Ituran service, please reauthenticate the integration.
